snippet: A new standard could make it easier for airlines to raise fares on some customers.
abstract: Editorial warns new standard agreed upon by world's largest airlines could significantly compromise customers' privacy and make it easier for airlines to charge travelers different prices for same trip.
lead_paragraph: A new standard could make it easier for airlines to raise fares on some customers.

headline.seo: Frequent Fliers, Prepare to Pay More
headline.main: Frequent Fliers, Prepare to Pay More
headline.print_headline: Frequent Fliers, Prepare to Pay More
